MainPage.title: Welcome!
MainPage.projectOverviewDesc: The REST Client is a comprehensive web application designed to streamline API interactions. This tool empowers developers to construct, test, and manage RESTful API requests efficiently, enhancing productivity.
MainPage.keyFeaturesReqConstMethodDesc: Choose from standard HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.).
MainPage.keyFeaturesReqConstEndpointDesc: Specify the target API endpoint with real-time validation.
MainPage.keyFeaturesReqConstHeadersDesc: Add, modify, or remove request headers.
MainPage.keyFeaturesReqConstBodyDesc: Craft request payloads with support for JSON and plain text formats, featuring syntax highlighting and formatting tools.
MainPage.keyFeaturesVarsDesc: Define and manage variables for dynamic request construction.
MainPage.keyFeaturesRespVisStatusDesc: View HTTP response codes and statuses clearly.
MainPage.keyFeaturesRespVisFormatDesc: Examine response bodies in a structured, readable format with syntax highlighting.
MainPage.keyFeaturesHistoryStorageDesc: Automatically save executed requests locally for future reference.
MainPage.keyFeaturesHistoryMgmtDesc: Browse, search, and re-execute past requests.
MainPage.techSpecFrameworksValue: React 19, Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI.
MainPage.techSpecRoutingValue: Encodes request details into the URL.
MainPage.techSpecErrorHandlingValue: User-Friendly Notifications, HTTP Error Response Display.
MainPage.conclusionDesc: This project delivers a robust and user-friendly environment for RESTful API development and testing. Its comprehensive feature set, combined with best practices in development and design, makes it a valuable tool for developers.
